titleStmt.title: Reasons humbly offered to consideration of the Parliament, for laying a further duty upon French, Spanish, and other foreign salt, (except Scotch salt, and what is consumed upon the fishery of this kingdom) towards the support and encouragement of the manufacture of salt on this nation.

Reasons humbly offered to consideration of the Parliament, for laying a further duty upon French, Spanish, and other foreign salt, (except Scotch salt, and what is consumed upon the fishery of this kingdom) towards the support and encouragement of the manufacture of salt on this nation.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
